Feature.Description: Allows to specify a certain logical position for a valve. The Position property can be querried at any time to obtain the current valve position.

Command.Description: Switches the valve to the specified position. The given position has to be less than the NumberOfPositions or else a ValidationError is thrown.

Parameter.Description: The target position that the valve should be switched to.

Command.Description: This command only applies for 2-way valves to toggle between its two different positions. If the command is called for any other valve type a ValveNotToggleable error is thrown.

Property.Description: The number of the valve positions available.
The current logical valve position. This is a value between 0 and NumberOfPositions - 1.

DefinedExecutionError.Description: The current valve does not support toggling because it has more than only two possible positions.
